p: The basic reproduction number (R 0) is an indicator of average number of possible infected people though the person who already had an infection. It explains how contagious is the disease and its precise estimation will highly important for epidemiologists especially when exposing to new pandemics like COVID-19. The total attack rate or individual percentage who got illness during COVID-19 outbreak in a defined population must be one of disease attribute which appears most plausibly predicted by R 0 estimation.
